plot: We live so close together. And yet we have never felt more alone. In a world where the grownups can't cope with being adults, a little girl has to shoulder the responsibility.
title: Vi bor faktiskt här
plot_es: We live so close together. And yet we have never felt more alone. In a world where the grownups can't cope with being adults, a little girl has to shoulder the responsibility.
plot_en: We live so close together. And yet we have never felt more alone. In a world where the grownups can't cope with being adults, a little girl has to shoulder the responsibility.
